entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 12
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS
LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE
HIGHS 15 TO 20
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS ZERO

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
